physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height: 146 cm, Weight: 60 kg, Span: 142 cm
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Cretinoid face without flattened bridge of nose; cold, pale, rough, and dry skin; no palpable thyroid tissue; pseudohypertrophy of gastrocnemic muscles; convergent strabismus; severely low reflex relaxation; severe mental retardation (IQ 56)

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Serum T4: <2 mg/dL, Serum T3: <50 ng/dL, Serum TSH: >80 mU/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe hypothyroidism with undetectable serum thyroglobulin (<2 ng/mL); reduced thyroid size observed in scintiscan
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum TSH normalized to 2.3 mU/mL at 6 months after treatment, and undetectable after 12 months
